DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether breathing pattern (specifically the inspiratory time/total respiratory cycle value) has an influence over the response to the noninvasive mechanical ventilation.
DOC.brief_title: Response to NonInvasive Mechanical Ventilation According to the Breathing Pattern
DOC.detailed_description: Breathing pattern will be analyzed along the adaptation to 3 different NonInvasive-Mechanical-Ventilation modes (controlled mode, spontaneous mode and placebo mode or simulator).
DOC.criteria: Hypercapnic chronic respiratory failure due to restrictive pulmonary disease (with usual criteria for home NonInvasive Mechanical Ventilation).
